short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PasteMe by Trackerbot is a dropshipping tool which helps you manage and fulfill your orders faster and easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Copy/paste single or multiple buyer addresses to any supplier
- Copy/paste from one computer to another
- Add Amazon items to cart in one click
- Insert note “Ordered” in one click

To activate free trial, install the chrome extension and log in with your Trackerbot credentials.
